name: GridItem
desc: A description of a single grid item, such as a row or a column.

items.name: init(GridItem.Size, spacing: CGFloat?, alignment: Alignment?)
items.desc: Creates a grid item with the provided size, spacing, and alignment properties.

items.name: var alignment: Alignment?
items.desc: The alignment to use when placing each view.

items.name: var spacing: CGFloat?
items.desc: The spacing to the next item.

items.name: var size: GridItem.Size
items.desc: The size of the item, which is the width of a column item or the height of a row item.

items.name: enum Size
items.desc: The size in the minor axis of one or more rows or columns in a grid layout.
